name: INVERSION (itch) (Realinspirer)
description:
Inversion is a platformer game in which the world consists of only two shades. White and black. And you have to beat few of the hardest levels in this world. Invert your shade whenever necessary, show how much you can control your hands, as this game will require it so much.

I hope you like this game. Made with ❤️ by Realinspirer.
